Karan Raj Kanwar About Us Zhill Patel "It's always fun to pick on the nerd.....Until he has your IP address." But are you a different animal and the same beast? "Karan Raj is a 3rd year Humber College student who enjoys app development, web design and databasing. His hobbies consist of playing competitive games, anything automotive based such as working on cars and drinking iced coffee's just to keep the blood pumping!" Zhill Patel is a 3rd year Computer Engineering student at Humber College who is interesting in app design. He is a guy who enjoys and loves the game of basketball and is an avid Toronto sports fan.
